item.description:
Vegan pot luck dinner and lecture by the anti hunting and wildlife
preservationist Anthony Marr. Please come Saturday August 7th to the Kline Geology Building 170 Whitney Ave. at 6:00 pm. (New Haven) Just drive into the parking lot across from Humphrey St. when you're on Whitney Ave. Drive straight back to the stop sign, turn left and there's plenty of parking. The Geology Building is the stone building to the far left of the lot. Walk into the glass
doors and turn left down the hall way. The lecture is in the first room to the
left. Please contact me and let me know what you want to bring for food, drinks etc. so I can make up any gaps. Manyplants3@yahoo.com
Anthony will have some great ideas and experiences to help us stop hunting in our state. Looking forward to seeing all of you! Vicki

See below for a brief biography about Anthony and a description of his tour.

World renowned wildlife preservationist​,​​ leading anti-hunting activist, environmentalist, author and speaker, Anthony Marr, who is currently on his 40-​​states-​​in-​​7-​​months" Compassion For
Animals Road Expedition" speaking tour #7 (CARE-7):
>>>
>>>
>>>Will be in New Haven, CT, speaking at the Kline Geology Building on Saturday,

>>>August 7th, 2010 at 6 pm. Anthony will be speaking on animal rights, hunting,
>
>>>environmental concerns and the urgent subject of his second book:
>>>"Homo Sapiens! SAVE YOUR EARTH":
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>>Anthony Marr's mini bio:
>>>Anthony Marr, environmentalis​t and animal rights activist, has a degree in
>>>physics and is the author of 2 books on environmental issues. A wildlife
>>>preservationist​ since 1995, his work in India garnered him the title of
>>>"Champion of the Bengal Tiger" in the award-winning TV-documentary series
>>>"Champions of the Wild" which aired in 20 countries on the Discovery
>>>and National Geographic channels. (see links below to view the documentary). Anthony has conducted 6 Compassion for Animals Road
>>>Expeditions (CARE tours) with this being his 7th such tour. Links at the bottom
>>
>>>of this letter will lead you to his websites and blog.
>>>He has also been to Japan, twice, for the whales and dolphins, and was recently
>>
>>>honored with the title "Best All-Around Activist of 2010" by two top U.S. animal
>>>
>>>rights organizations. Anthony was also honored at the 2010 Animal Rights
>>>National Conference in Washington D.C. with the prestigious "Henry Spira Grass
>
>>>Roots Activist Award for his outstanding contribution to animal liberation".

http://homosapienssav...
>>>Anthony has conducted several high-profile campaigns against the seal and
>>>grizzly bear hunts in Canada, deer culls and sea lion exterminations in North America.
>>>
>>>
>>>Anthony Marr is the founder and president of
>>>Heal Our Planet Earth (HOPE)
>>>the Global Anti Hunting Coalition (GAHC)
>>>You can find out more about his fascinating life and work in the following
>>>websites:
>>>
>>>www.HOPE-CARE.org


>>>www.MySpace.com/AnthonyMarr


>>>www.YouTube.com/AnthonyMarr


>>>www.myspace.com/Anti-Hunting_Coalition


>>>www.facebook.com/Anthony.Marr.001


>>>www.facebook.com/Global_Anti-Hunting_Coalition


>>>www.HomoSapiensSaveYourEarth.blogspot.com


>>>www.facebook.com
